byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Debts to U S: Finland defers payment; Min Procope, in note to State Dept, states intention to pay
snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 30--In accordance with a Congressional resolution of June 15, Finland will postpone the payment of its Dec. 15 debt installment to the United States of $235,398, but will not repudiate its debt....

headline.main: FINLAND DEFERS PAYMENT OF DEBT; Accepts Extension by Congress of Dec. 15 Installment and Hopes to Revise Terms GRATITUDE IS EXPRESSED Envoy, in Letter to Secretary Hull, States Country Intends to Meet Its Obligations

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 30--In accordance with a Congressional resolution of June 15, Finland will postpone the payment of its Dec. 15 debt installment to the United States of $235,398, but will not repudiate its debt.
